text: Josip Pirmajer (14 February 1944 â€“ 24 June 2018) was a Slovenian footballer. He played for Yugoslavia and later became a manager. He was born in Trifail, Nazi Germany. He played for Novi Sad, Partizan and Vojvodina. Pirmajer died on 24 June 2018 in Srbobran, Serbia from a heart attack at the age of 74.Novosti.rs article ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Slovenian footballers
title: Josip Pirmajer
